alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 12:04PM EST until February 09 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Hamilton, Northern Warren and Northern Fulton Counties. In Vermont, the southern Green Mountains of Bennington and Western Windham Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute in the highest elevations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation including freezing rain will change to plain rain, first at the lowest elevations this afternoon and eventually at the highest elevations this evening. The greatest ice accumulations will occur at elevations above 2000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
